text:
Tomcat Connectors version: 18 May 2007 - JK-1.2.23 released,
IIS version:IIS5,

when tomcat5 (server.xml) http port set to default(8080), Tomcat Connectors 
can connect IIS, but when port set to 8084, Tomcat Connectors can't connect 
IIS.
creator: sdkjdxgaolei@126.com
markt@apache.org
text:
Tomcat doesn't use http to communicate with IIS, it uses AJP. It appears you
need help getting your configuration correct.

Bugzilla is not a support forum. Please use the users list for help.
